name: Bread Shooter Legends
description:
Game done with Unity for the Mini Jam 94 : Baking.

Your goal is to shoot at ennemies waves to protect your beloved farmers that allow you to buy more ammo. Protect and grow the village !

Controls are intuitives : Displace camera with left click and zoom with mouse wheel.

Shoot on ennemies to kill them, and buy some farmers and ammos !

Externals Assets used :
